§ Kehb Inspirations

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⚠️ **SPOILER ALERT**

The inspiration for the [[kehb]] character from [[world-18]] is the **ancient Egytpian deity**: **Geb**.
Whose name is also sometimes spelled as: **Gebb**, **Keb**, **Kebb**, and **Seb**.

In //ancient Egytpian mythology// **Geb** is sometimes depicted as person with green skin.

**Geb** is also sometimes also considered the father of **Osiris**.
